e: ￹`Pala~`facen~ `koya~ `kolong~ `ta~ `ira~ `a~ `ma~`kilim~ `nira~ `ko~ `kakaenen~.￺Let the water buffalo roam so he can find food.￻把牛放掉好讓牛能找到草吃
d.f: ￹￺free to roam * referring to an animal loose￻自由自在，自由徜徉，指放走回歸於自然

e: ￹`Pala~`facen~.￺Let the animal go free.￻放走，釋放，把動物放生
d.f: ￹￺(an animal) being loose and free to roam￻(動物) 飛掉或溜掉
